title: trialstart
body:
These women are all on trial for the most heinous crime imaginable...
Promiscuity in the first degree!
We will start by calling Hester Prynne to the stand!
[[Oh no! Not Hester!|hestertrial]][[It's okay! I'll help her!|hestertrial]]

title: hestertrial
body: <<hestertrial>>

title: hestertrialstart
body:
Hester Prynne, you stand accused of having a child out of wedlock!
Do you have anything to say on her behalf?
[[That was forever ago! She's suffered enough!|hesterwrong]] [[There is no excuse for her actions|hesterright]]

title: hesterwrong
body: <<hesterwrong>>

title: hesterright
body: <<hesterright>>

title: normal
body: <<hesternormal>>

title: hesterwrong2
body:
What?! How dare you stand up for this whore!
You deserve to suffer just like her!
Hester Prynne, for your crimes I sentence you...
to belong to this man!
She's your problem now!
[[Oh thank goodness!|normal]] [[What? she can't belong to anyone!|hesterwrong3]]

title: hesterright2
body:
That's right!
Us men can't control ourselves...
but women should keep their legs CLOSED!
Hester Prynne, for your crimes, I sentence you...
to DEATH!
[[No!!!!|normal]][[*phew* At least it's not me!|normal]]

title: hesterwrong3
body: <<hesterwrong3>>

title: bunnytrialstart1
body:
Now that she's taken care of...
I call to the stand...
Bunny!
[[Bunny?|bunnytrialstart]][[Not another one...|bunnytrialstart]]

title: bunnytrialstart
body: <<bunnytrial>>

title: bunnytrial
body:
Bunny, you stand here accused of an even worse crime than Miss Prynne!
You sold pictures of yourself in the nude for money!
You wore skimpy outfits to entertain men for money!
And worst of all...
You didn't do any of this for free even when we were nice to you!
What do you have to say for her?!
[[Women have the right to say no to you!|bunnywrong]][[Sluts must die!|bunnyright]]

title: bunnywrong
body: <<bunnywrong>>

title: bunnyright
body: <<bunnyright>>

title: bunnywrong2
body:
Oh hell no!
Nice men deserve sexual favors!
Even if that makes her a slut!
That's it!
Bunny! I sentence you...
To be sent to a convent!
[[That's not fair!|bunnywrong3]][[I hope she learns her lesson...|bunnynormal]]

title: bunnywrong3
body: <<bunnywrong3>>

title: bunnynormal
body: <<bunnynormal>>

title: bunnyright2
body:
Good man!
This is a horror afterall...
and in horror...
Sexuality equals death!
Bunny, I sentence you...
to DEATH!
[[No!!!!|bunnynormal]][[She deserves it!|bunnynormal]]

title: hesterwrong4
body:
Oh yes she can!
Now shut up and let the real men take care of this!
[[Yes, sir!|normal]][[...|normal]]

title: bunnywrong4
body:
Yes it is!
Now silence before I sentence you to chastity as well!
[[Yes, sir!|bunnynormal]] [[...|bunnynormal]]

title: trialend2
body: <<trialend>>

title: trialend
body:
The trial is now over!
I hope you've learned your place young man!
Though I'll admit...
That is an excellent mustache...
[[I definitely have...|trialend2]] [[Uh, thanks...|trialend2]]
